Здравствуйте.Сегодня я буду обозревать Counter Strike:Source.Это хорошое продолжение замечательной 1.6 .В ней переработана графика и физика , больше ни каких изминений я не заметил.Многим людям не нравиться эта часть CS но лично мне она очень нравиться т.к. тут на серверах меньше школьников чем в 1.6 и CS GO.В основном на серверах играют "Отцы контры" которые в детстве не выходили из дома и просто задрили в кс.Здесь вы научитесь играть если раньше никогда не играли в кс.Спасибо за внимание рекомендую эту игру моя оценка 10/10(т.к. нету школьников).

an issue with your computer is blocking the vac system wtf !

CS:S is possibly the most popular online FPS ever made. It surpasses most of its competition with great gameplay mechanics. Good graphics(For its time). Awesome community servers(Zombie Run is a blast). And many other features that make this game good. If you are not a decent player, no worries. You can play against bots to improve your accuracy and other skills. All and all, its a great experience to play even to this day! This was my second steam game and have enjoyed it since I got it in 2010. I recommend this game to Pros and Noobs alike.

What can I say? Even a decade later (Yes, that's right, a DECADE!), this game is still fun to play! I have had a lot of fun with Gun Game servers, and the regular gamemodes are still a good time. Also, owning this game alongside Garry's Mod is great because it gives Garry's Mod most of the vital textures that it requires for the average player to have a fun experience. Overall, I think Counter-Strike: Source is definitely a game that most Steam users should have in their library.

Куча школо-быдло серверов с характерной музыкой в конце раунда, подз***авшие приветствия в духе: "Добро пожаловать на наш УГ сервер, с читами не играйте (но всем насрать), и получайте фан, бла-бла-бла". Тупые игроки, не только школьники, но и просто гопники которые играют на пиратке, которые матерятся, обсирают игроков за плохую игру, хотя в КСС в целом не может быть командной тактики на таких серверах.

Não vale a pena comprar este jogo, me arrependi bastante. Por vários motivos: inexistem servidores disponíveis para jogar; os que existem são sempre modificados (longe do CS limpo); poucos jogadores. O CS Global Offensive é muito melhor, mesmo para quem vem do clássico CS.

Molte delle persone che hanno conosciuto Counter-Strike: Source dopo aver giocato solo ed esclusivamente a Global Offensive lo riterranno [i]"un capitolo precedente a cui non giocare perché tale"[/i]. Ahimé errorissimo.

La leggerezza, unita alla tonnellata di materiale creato dalla comunità lo rende tutt'ora popolatissimo.
Migliaia di server aperti tutt'ora e popolati quotidianamente lo rendono un acquisto che non rimpiangerete.
Per giocare a garry's mod è necessario avere le texture e i modelli di CS:S sul proprio pc.
Ci sono due modi per farlo: comprare il gioco o scaricarle e piazzarvele nella directory di Garry's Mod.

Un acquisto consigliatissimo a distanza di svariati anni dall'uscita. Una delle punte di diamante della valve sicuramente.

Come on you know you want it if you don't already have it. This is an old multiplayer shooter that is easily more fun then COD or any other fast multiplayer shooters. This game does take some skill to get the hang of it but after few matches you will see why this game still has die hard fans that play more hours then they work. This is a must have game 10 out of 10.
